name: FartPart
description:
Have you ever been to the village toilets? Yes? Well, then you are more lucky than our heroes, who in the heat of battle were forced to resort to tactical shelter for natural need, but in the magical world and magic toilets that open the gates to the world of magic... fairy-tale incidents. Enjoy!

Fart Part - Arcade game with fart jokes will not let you get bored and hungry, resorting to quick thinking and reactions mongoose you need with lightning speed at the right moment to press the button and spewing out character with extra and diabolical gases, which will give him the needed boost and will add speed to further flight, but it is worth remembering the sharp edges of the rocks, the rocks falling down at the wrong time and distracting the birds, which can not understand all your pain in the current awkward situation.

Feature of game:
- Lots of toilet humor
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Simple controls
- Reaction training
- Lots of different characters
